duration_in_months: This Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) is a public notice indicating to the supplier community that Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada intends to award a service contract to a pre-identified supplier, thereby allowing other suppliers to signal their interest in bidding. When the notice is posted, the deadline for submission of the statement of capabilities is 21 days from the publication date. If the supplier is qualified according to the criteria provided in the notice, the Crown may proceed with the award of a contract.
